alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:14PM EDT until July 11 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND NORTHERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 414 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dexter, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Ann Arbor around 425 PM EDT. Dixboro around 435 PM EDT. Ypsilanti around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hudson Mills, Lakeland, Hudson Mills Metropark, Delhi Mills, Barton Hills, Pinckney State Recreation Area and Hell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
